duties_responsibilities.duty: Architect, design and oversee the implementation of AEM solutions that ensure the platform's reliability, scalability, and efficiency.
Lead and guide a team of AEM developers, providing technical expertise and mentorship to drive successful project delivery.
Serve as the primary point of contact for technical stakeholders, understanding requirements, and translating them into high-level design documents and architecture solutions.
Utilize Java, JSP, Servlets, Ajax, XML, Jquery, and JSON web technologies to implement new developments and ensure adherence to AEM best practices.
Collaborate with onsite and offshore teams to technically own the AEM solution and ensure seamless integration with Adobe Experience Cloud services.
Provide technical support to customers, acting as the Subject Matter Expert (SME) for AEM and offering solutions that meet their business needs.
Configure and optimize the AEM platform, including Dispatcher configuration, Workflows, Headless, and latest features, while ensuring DevOps best practices.
Facilitate collaboration and integration with Adobe's broader suite of digital experience management (DXM) technologies, including Adobe Marketing Cloud and Adobe Analytics.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field (Master's preferred)
